snippet: Andrelton Simmons drove in four runs as the Atlanta Braves beat the visiting Arizona Diamondbacks, 10-4, Saturday for their season-high ninth straight victory.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Atlanta Braves defeat Arizona Diamondbacks, 10-4, earning their season-high ninth straight victory; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Andrelton Simmons drove in four runs as the Atlanta Braves beat the visiting Arizona Diamondbacks, 10-4, Saturday for their season-high ninth straight victory.

headline.print_headline: Braves Earn Ninth Straight Win as They Pound the Slumping Diamondbacks
headline.main: Braves Earn Ninth Straight Win as They Pound the Slumping Diamondbacks
